price: Nuti halkan barakeeffamtuu keessa isa buufne. Nuti dinniinoo taaneerra.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
